website_summaries.verdict: You don't have to be a parent to appreciate the brilliance of a smart thermometer, which stores health details to share with medical professionals.
pros: Sleeping babies and kids keep from waking due to the ease of use
Illuminated screen provides a clear readout
Also tracks medications and helps keep track of symptoms
Sets up like any other Bluetooth-enabled device
App has resources on treating common ailments
cons: Some users report a connectivity issue, having to uninstall and reinstall the app
Temperature can be slightly different than reading from standard thermometer

website_summaries.verdict: The Kinsa Smart Ear Thermometer is fast, accurate, and convenient, and can track illnesses spreading where you live.
cons: Groups feature depends on other Kinsa users

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent and unreliable readings
customer_reviews.text: I had great hopes for this device but I have shelved it as a useless product and waste of money. The readings are inconsistent and random. I tried taking my temperature back-to-back in both ears on multiple occasions. Each time I took a total of six readings, alternating them between each ear (3 readings per ear). The results were all over the place. Either I had a below-average temperature or else I had a fever over 100. One time, I actually received a standard reading of 98.6. I even tried this on another person, with the same, terrible results. I read the instructions and followed them closely. This product is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t measure temperature accurately
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermometer for use with my new baby, but she did not experience her first fever until after the return period had passed, when I discovered that the thermometer does not work. It measures temperature 3-5 degrees low compared to other thermometers (and reads my unfevered temperature as 94 degrees). I followed Kinsa support recommendations for resetting and recalibrating, but it did not help.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Received a used thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Love the thermometer except I'm pretty sure amazon sold me a used one! Opened the box this evening after it arrived, noticed it already had the batteries in it even though the box had a battery slot, down loaded the app, synched the blue tooth, and then noticed multiple temperatures from Oct 13, 14, and 15 logged, except today is Nov 4. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate readings!
customer_reviews.text: I can only speak on the thermometer's ability to take temperatures because I never even linked it to my phone. No matter what I did, I constantly got a reading between 102 and 104 degrees Fahrenheit, even when I wasn't sick. Needless to say, it is not reliable. I would have returned it if I'd gotten to it in time.
customer_reviews.author: Taiesha Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Readings Vary Greatly within just a few seconds of each other....
customer_reviews.text: I like that it takes the temperature so quick and I like the syncing to my phone BUT I can take my temperature 3 times in a row and it gives a wide range of readings from 98.6 to 101.3 in just a few seconds. I have been sick and don't know which reading to trust.
customer_reviews.author: JodiBlonde

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to take her temperature as well as mine. She uses this thermometer with ease and can tell me if I have a fever or not. It's tied into my phone's app using bluetooth. So, it makes it so easy to keep track of how her temperature has been tracking/trending over the past few hours, days. I've taken the device to the dr to show them even. It has been so helpful. I haven't changed the batteries since I received the device and that has been over 2 years ago. It's super light weight and durable. I'd definitely suggest this for anyone in need of a thermometer, but just a parent.
customer_reviews.author: chizu131

customer_reviews.title: This is a great easy to use thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great easy to use thermometer. Not so easy to set up (hence the 4 stars) but once you do hook it up to the app it works great. The thermometer also works without needing to be connected to a smart device- so anyone can still use it. The screen is easy to read and it really does take your temperature quickly. The little cap that comes along with the thermometer is great for protecting the tip of it, but I have a bit of a hard time getting it off, but I guess that’s a good thing! Planning to buy the additional parts to the thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy way to get a temperature.
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter had the flu over the weekend so we have had ample opportunity to use this. Each time we took her temperature we also took our own as a way to validate the results for accuracy (she was burning up, we were not). We have not had a need to use the app so I can't speak to that but the use of the thermometer itself is so simple and straightforward. I am so thankful I went with this one because it was so easy to use on our very fussy baby.
customer_reviews.author: MLH

customer_reviews.title: More off a toy than a medical instrument
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to be good. The ease or use and the app are great. Unfortunately, it fails its most important task of taking an accurate temperature. It isn't even close, giving reads of 91 degrees. Worse yet, it is inconsistent. 91 degrees folllowed by 96 followed by 92. I read the instructions hoping I was doing something wrong but I was doing the right steps. I wouldn't recommend this one:
customer_reviews.author: DJR

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Readings
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I thought it would be good to use. I had been searching for a while for a better thermometer. Thought I would give this one a try. Well it worked once and then after I kept getting inaccurate readings. Amazon sent me a replacement. The replacement did the same thing. So I sent it back as well. I am so tired of not being able to find an accurate thermometer for my kids. My son was sick and had a 101 temp, but this thermometer was saying his temp was only 98. The other thermometer I had that you put under arm was saying 101. That is a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey N McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Was worried about accuracy, but it delivered
customer_reviews.text: I dragged my feet for a while before replacing my tried-and-true thermometer at home. Some reviews suggested that the accuracy of the Kinsa products might not be that great. But I tested this side by side with my own thermometer and haven't looked back since starting to use it. It was especially helpful for tracking the progression fevers during flu season. No more struggling to remember temperatures for the doctor or looking for post-its to jot the info down. Now it's all in the app.
customer_reviews.author: Anji

customer_reviews.title: Buy it and thank me later.
customer_reviews.text: Best. Thermometer. EVER. We have the Kinsa Smart Stick Thermometer and it works great but this one is by far the best! It literally takes one second to get the temp and when you're dealing with a fussy baby the last thing you want is for the thermometer to take forever to get their temp. The fact that it sends all readings to the app is just the cherry on top of the sundae. Seriously. Buy it. You can thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney K.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped being accurate after one month
customer_reviews.text: It worked great when we first bought it in December. However, after about a month, it stopped sinking with the app on the phone. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app and it's still not working so I gave up on that part. However, last night my son felt hot, so I took his temp . 4 times it showed 98.6F. So I used the old Braun ones we had and they consistently showed temp over 102!! I tried it 5-6 more times it never showed temp above 98.6 when my son clearly had a fever. SO disappointed in this product!
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this product is accurate. I can take three readings and all three are very different. I am sitting with my son who is clearly very fevered but I get readings between 97.6 (not even close) to 101 (still too low in my opinion) taken within seconds of each other.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very accurate
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is inaccurate and all over the place... you take it once, and it says you're 97 degrees... take it immediately after and it says you're 99 degrees... etc. There's just no consistency here. The nice thing is that it can automatically send the temperature to the app on your phone... but, if the temperature isn't accurate, it doesn't matter if the technology is "cool".
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent thermometer.
customer_reviews.text: Best thermometer ever... especially if you have kids. Easy to use, easy to read. I love the integration with the app. Great way to keep track when your kids are sick and if they are getting better or worse. Wish I had this when my son was young. Gives you suggestions for care, allows you to take notes or document medication given.
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Great until you need customer support
customer_reviews.text: This was a good thermometer when I first received it all two years ago, but since they updated their app recently it doesn’t work. I’ve emailed them three timesin the first time they emailed me back. The second time they close my ticket and I emailed them about it again. the third time they close my ticket again. I don’t know what kind of customer support that is, but I would advise not purchasing. Okay about a month ago. I was contacted by customer service and they sent me a new thermometer which is working perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cody J. Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Guys, I don’t think I’ve been more satisfied with a thermometer before. We bought this to be able to have a new accurate thermometer for when the new baby comes but it connects to your phone, you have profiles for everyone in your house, and it keeps track of everything. I just used it on My son and I just playing around and it worked great. My temp was a little low 97.3, so it had me retake it to verify accuracy and then asked me if I had any symptoms, it tracks your symptoms and puts it all in with a time stamp.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Steinmann

customer_reviews.title: It loses Bluetooth connection with the Kinsa app and CANNOT be reconnected.
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer is easy to use. Very consistent temperature readings. But, I bought it because I could keep a temperature record via the app. The thermometer connected to the app ONE time. The it lost connection. The company publishes ridiculous ways to reconnect the Bluetooth. Very detailed and complex and I followed perfectly. These instructions do not work. So, if you want a quick temperature check that seems reasonably accurate, and certainly consistent, then this might be right for you. But, if you want to use the app, fugidaboutit.
customer_reviews.author: JLK

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, buy a different one!
customer_reviews.text: So, it works..... But! The ear position if VERY critical with this model. Get the angle wrong and so the reading will be too. This combined with the fact that you can say “yes” to a clearly wrong reading, but the is no “no” to say no too. Who the hell would put a YES with no way to say NO... just dumber the a box of rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Jay S.

customer_reviews.title: My New Go-To!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with thermometer! It is by far the easiest and fastest thermometer I've ever tried. Receiving your temperate really does take only 1 second and the results are accurate. The app that's connected with it may just be the best part. It is so helpful when the kids are sick, and you need a quick reference on how they're feeling. It is easy to use and will take the place of having your young ones struggle to keep a thermometer in their mouth, and not always getting accurate results. This Kinsa thermometer will definitely be my go-to for those sick days!
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Three

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent low readings. Don’t Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worst thermometer you can buy. We actually bought this a second time thinking the first one went bad. The readings are never correct. Are children were burning up and it said 97.3 with a smile almost every time. Never above. We put in an old fashion under the tongue one and it showed a 100.2. That is a serious difference. So don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: George J Wescott

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what all the hype is for this thermometer. I’m pretty disappointed. I can take a temperature in the same ear and never get the same reading. Also, half the time it says “LO”. I’ve followed the instructions for cleaning to no avail. It does have an easy to read display and is easy to push the button, too bad it’s never accurate and only works sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel GC

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent readings
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't feeling well last night so I tried this thermometer on myself and at first it read a high fever. I rechecked it one minute later and then it said 98.6. We also tried it on my spouse and it gave him two very different readings within a minute as well. We read all of the instructions and even re-calibrated the device and tried again and it is still totally unreliable. What a shame because we really wanted to love it for the Bluetooth feature!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Do not recommend! I bought this for the arrival of my son March 2020. It was very inaccurate. I had to clean it with a q tip and alcohol before every use for it to almost be accurate. Now after using it maybe 15 times it won't even turn on. I've changed the batteries and it still won't turn on. Such a waste of money. Cool concept but totally missed the mark
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date?
customer_reviews.text: Im very happy with the thermometer itself. It was easy to use and appears to be really accurate. My biggest issue is with the batteries. When I opened the package, it was covered in the potassium from the batteries. They were so old, as if the box had been sitting on a shelf for years. Other than that, the thing I actually paid for, the thermometer itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Wygle

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on babies/toddlers
customer_reviews.text: The Kinsa ear thermometer does not take accurate readings on babies or toddlers. I followed the directions and would pull her ear back to allow for the probe to get into her ear canal but it’s just too big. My daughter is 4yrs old and Kinsa is finally taking accurate readings. While she is still young, we really wanted to be able to track her fevers back when she was a baby (under 2yrs). The ear thermometer we used when she was a baby/toddler was the Braun thermoscan. We had to pull back her ear for that thermometer too but at least we could get an accurate reading.
customer_reviews.author: J Leder

customer_reviews.title: Does not work and unethical company
customer_reviews.text: I have cleaned the product, used new batteries, and did a hard reset for it to consistently read 94-95 degrees F. I would never purchase this product again. Update: contacted the company and they said they would send me a new one and they asked me to send the item back. I sent the item back over a month ago and still haven’t received a new one from the company. Terrible product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing I ever bought it does not work .. I expect it to be great but it is the worst thing ever bought Do Not Buy .. I put new batteries and it tells you low indicator than I went and bought another and another same issue than it gives you wrong temp and I did not give my kids Neda thinking he is ok .. finally we ended up In The ER unreal we are so angry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to take a child’s temp!
customer_reviews.text: I’m updating this review because while I still love this thermometer for the convenience and “cool” factor (my 3 year old daughter asks to take her temp to hear Elmo!!) we discovered it’s not as accurate as a standard thermometer (rectal method). So while sticking a thermometer up my 18-month-old’s butt is not NEARLY as fun (in fact it’s quite torturous!!) we’ve found the temperature is off by almost a full degree! I.e. 100.2 Kinsa thermometer is actually 101.2 via rectal temperature. But I think as the kids’ ears get bigger (because we scan the ear with this Kinsa thermometer) it will be more accurate so we will still keep and use this!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Joy

customer_reviews.title: Best Thermometer Ever
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer has an app where you can put in your symptoms as it automatically records your temperature and it give you tips! This is so helpful! You can set up different profiles for people in your household. Seriously amazing. Impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Average Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Super frustrating. I love the IDEA of this, but it’s not accurate in the least bit....I can take my toddlers temperature 20 different times and get a crazy variety of readings. Not reassuring
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: High quality, accurate digital thermometer for all.
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased the Kinsa Digital Smart Ear Thermometer and could not be happier! The technology is fast, accurate, and the product is designed with simplicity in mind. The step-by-step directions included in the packaging make it simple to connect the digital thermometer to your smart phone in a matter of seconds. We love that you can track this information on your phone and have it at your finger tips at all times. The app stores the date and time of the temperature reading and allows you to add additional information (ex. name of person you are tracking). After using a variety of thermometers, this is our new favorite. The price point is a major bonus too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love...Love...Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love...Love...Love that I can track my family of four individually. This winter we were all sick - I couldn't keep track of everyone's temperatures or when we were each due for various medications. This will keep track of it all for you!!!
customer_reviews.author: krudy

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but inaccurate readings.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this thermometer because it had such great reviews when I bought it. It matched up with my regular thermometer for the first couple uses, but now it almost consistently reads "96.7" even if my son has a fever. It does have a cute setting where Elmo can talk your child through the temperature taking process, but it doesn't do much good if the reading is inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect temps!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only owned this for 6 months and it is already giving incorrect temp reads. I even brought it to my child’s doctors office to confirm. My daughter had a fever and I didn’t know because it was reading lower temps!
customer_reviews.author: amanda st. amour

customer_reviews.title: Would give it ZERO STARS if I could!  DEAD only two days after delivery!
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered two days ago. Already dead and nonfunctional. First use was great -- amazingly fast reading. A battery came with it, but yesterday there was a low battery reading. I replaced the batteries, but still a low reading. Today it doesn't even turn on at all. How do I return this item now that I no longer have the packaging?
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: SUPER FAST & ACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: - Lightweight and easy to hold - Setup is simple. The app walks you step by step. - Accurate readings (Smiley faces make it super fun when explaining to your toddler what their temperature is) - Sesame Street mode is a nice touch. It helps to brighten up the kiddos sick time. - My favorite thing about it is how quickly it gives you readings. It's literally a two second thing. At times it goes so fast that I check a second time just to make sure I got it right. This comes in handy when you have a toddler that just won't sit still.
customer_reviews.author: pm514v

customer_reviews.title: Every mom and dad should own one
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer paired with the app is the greatest parent accessorie ever invented. The app is super easy to navigate. Setting up profiles for each family member is quick and easy. It remembers temps along with symptoms which make it easy to repeat back to a doctor. Spend the money and get this thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: AEBennett

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, not accurate at all!
customer_reviews.text: While the display is nice and the size is great, the accuracy is horrible! I was loving the idea of this sync to my phone and have a log of temperatures. Having a medically complex child that needs to have accurate temperatures made me purchase 2 of these, 1 for my bag and 1 for home. Neither are accurate or close to each other in their readings. I do not recommend this product. I am very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Harper03

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth beats Kinsa Stick
customer_reviews.text: We had the Kinsa stick for some time, and have switched to this one, as it is easier to use, more convenient because of Bluetooth and I find it to be more accurate once using it. Family can use it without needing my phone and app with them as it syncs at any time. Really great investment.
customer_reviews.author: ShariMari

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, because I liked the app tracking and help connected to thermometer. And the app is wonderful and helpful, however the thermometer itself is wildly inaccurate the majority of the time. I use for my children mostly, and I dont know if it's because their ears are too small for the device or what. I took my child's temputre with this device and it says 100.5, and then took under the arm with a reliable digital thermometer which read 103.4!! This is a MAJOR discrepancy!!! I reccomend Braun brand with exactemp instead, which is what I had before until a toddler got ahold of it and it got broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Sick babys best friend
customer_reviews.text: If your a mom of Littles this is a must have!! One second ear reading is amazing and the app is my best friend when baby I'd sick and I need to keep track of everything. It is the most accurate one I've found. Any reading consistency issues are wiggly baby related for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The hardware is great, software connection is iffy.
customer_reviews.text: The in ear testing is great for a sleepy sick child. The connection to my phone is temperamental, and I can't seem to get the consistency for recording. Hardward is great. The software is good in theory but the implementation still needs work.
customer_reviews.author: BENJAMIN CARTER-ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other reviewers, I’ve found this thermometer to be very accurate for children and adults. So much easier to use than an under the tongue thermometer. The app tracks temperatures and you can add in medications and symptoms to keep a record. This thermometer is an invaluable asset to our household.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie

customer_reviews.title: Quick easy reliable and future looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermometer as a replacement to our brown ear one which worked fine until i dropped and then it never turned on again. So I got this Kinsa thermometer which seemed like a comparable but updated with more.modern functionality thermometer. It works and feels great and I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie A.

customer_reviews.title: Technology wise-great, accuracy wise-horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY want to love this but it’s beyond inaccurate. Every time I take a temp it’s atleast 2-3 degrees off compared to another thermometer. I thought maybe I wasn’t getting it far enough in my children’s ear so I tested it on myself, same outcome. According to this, our average family temperatures are 96.6 degrees...I rarely get a reading higher than that. When you have a sick child, accuracy is obviously important. I love the extras as far as what you can track but it’s missing the key one-an accurate temperature.
customer_reviews.author: JBegaway

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy use for squirmy kids
customer_reviews.text: I have only just received this thermometer, but I am already impressed. The set up was very quick and easy, and it takes an ear temperature SO fast. I have used other thermometers of this caliber and cost and none of them compare to this speed. It is so helpful with squirmy babies and toddlers, I only wish I had made the purchase sooner. The Bluetooth use and app are added bonus and instant from temperature to phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Sheeran

customer_reviews.title: Quick reader, easy to use, remembers and stores info
customer_reviews.text: Love that it remembers the temp and sends to your phone and you can have more than one user. Super simple to use and immediately tells you what the temp is. Toddler won’t stay still for a long time for a traditional thermometer so this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Necessity with a family
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how I didn’t own this before. It reads the temperature so fast. The app is good too. You can track symptoms, temps, meds ... it helps when you have a family of sickies and need to track who got what when. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: TBF2020

customer_reviews.title: 100% UNRELIABLE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I was fooled by a review site calling this the "best thermometer." What a joke. I don't need a frikin' app for my thermometer. I just need a reliable temperature reading, which this has never produced. Not one time. Not one single time. Maybe ours is defective? Either way, won't be buying anymore Kinsa products.
customer_reviews.author: Benwarz

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer. I love that it syncs with my phone to record temps for everyone in the family. I wish it had covers though. I bought braun ones but they do not fit well and they can't be used on my youngest child's ear because his ear canal is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money - never a consistent temperature reading
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is a complete waste of money. I can take a temperature, get a reading if 101.4, take it again in the same ear and get a reading of 98.6. I bought it as an easy way to take my kids temperature and I don’t trust it at all. Save your money and buy a different thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy9650

customer_reviews.title: False readings!
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this thermometer. I received this for Christmas and we tried it out many times. It keeps reading our whole family has a fever. Not accurate!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kinsa Thermometer is a must have product for any new mom.
customer_reviews.text: Having a thermometer linked to an app so you can easily track & record temperature changes is what makes the Kinsa so easy to use. You can have a profile for each family member, and also record when the next dose of medication can be taken. What's really impressive is the groups function, which allows you to see if there are sicknesses going around in your child's classroom. The features of this thermometer are designed to help moms relay accurate information to your child's doctor, without having to remember to write everything down. Hands down this is a must have product for any new mom and is far superior to any other thermometer I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do you want a consistent reading? Good luck.
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to know if I had a fever - put it in my right ear, 100.7. Left ear, 99.8. Right ear again... 97.9. Left ear again, 96.2. several readings between 93-94, guess I am hypothermic? And this for baby, kid, and adult? Tried taking readings on my 4 year old, consistently telling me 'Lo' or '93.3'. This thing is utterly useless. Shame on you Kinsa. Maybe this thermometer could concentrate a little less on it's app (which is actually nice) and more on getting me a consistent temperature so I know what is wrong. Would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use and product does not last
customer_reviews.text: I give 1 star rating for this product because of following: 1. It is difficult to connect to my mobile device Bluetooth, many occasion I can't connect (timeout) 2. Battery does not last long, after 2 month I will need to replace the battery 3. The product does not last, almost 1 year and now it is completely useless. I can not use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Riwut Libinuko

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up, easy to use, instant read
customer_reviews.text: The app took moments to download, and I was able to instantly pair the thermometer with the app with zero problem. Moments later, it prompted me to use the ear thermometer, and instantly it showed me the reading on the thermometer itself and on my app. The app keeps track of every temperature you take, and allows for different user profiles for different members of your family. The app has great resources, including asking about symptoms and giving suggestions for what to do next. It also lets you sync with the Apple health app. This truly is the easiest to use, most advanced thermometer I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: ellepea

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate! Help!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read BUT does not connect to my phone anymore and is NOT accurate! It says my temp is 94.4 and it won’t even read my baby’s temp. Says LO. I pull his ear gently to try and get better angles and it still doesn’t work! Please help!
customer_reviews.author: AmyL

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I want and what was advertised! I used this on my 12 and 10yr old and myself very easy to use and temp is accurate. I have used it on myself to! I also like how it records everything for you! I have an iPhone and haven’t had any issues! Makes like so much easier if you have to go to the ER or doctors office so you can show them everything!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Worst thermometer ever!
customer_reviews.text: If there was a zero star rating I would have chosen that! My child had a fever of 106.3 rectally. I used this thermometer in his ear to gage it. It read 98.6!!!! Seriously!!!!! This is the worst thermometer I have ever used!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kal

customer_reviews.title: Ours must be defective
customer_reviews.text: Ours worked for the first 2-3 times we used it. We bought it 3 months ago and pulled it out to use it again and it says all 4 family members have temperatures of between 94-95 degrees. We changed out the new batteries and got the same result. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: AngieG

customer_reviews.title: Horribly inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I loved the Kinsa probe thermometer so much I went and bought this one too. But it’s horribly inaccurate on every one of my family members, infant, child and adult, even after resetting it per their instructions.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy, but a battery eater
customer_reviews.text: A friend let me borrow this thermometer when my 4 year old was sick and I loved it, it was quick, easy, and accurate - my 4 year old begged me to let her take her temperature. Win win. Do I decided I needed to buy one. The one that I received, however, has an issue with the batteries. I have needed to replace the batteries 4 times already and I've only needed to use it twice. It doesn't connect to my Moto E but that didn't bother me, I liked it because how fast and easy it is to take a temperature - but having to constantly change the batteries is extremely frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Conner

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Been needing a new thermometer for a while now and i am happy I decided on this one. It takes a reading instantly and that is a plus with a toddler. Also love the app and all the features it has. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalGemini88

customer_reviews.title: Not an accurate thermometer for kids
customer_reviews.text: I ended up purchasing this after lots of searching, and it turns out it's just a terrible thermometer for kids. One measurement was 95.5 with this and others went as high as 98.6, but a regular thermometer showed 102.1 under his arm.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Prater

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great app
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer. It is a quick reading and then the app will give you advice on how to treat symptoms or if you should go to the Dr. Etc. I got this primarily for use on our baby and that is great that you can track symptoms and it will give you a recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended by first-time mom of fiesty baby girl!!!
customer_reviews.text: Being a new mom, there are plenty of things to worry about in those first few months. We live in New England and our daughter was born in the peak of cold season. That meant dealing with the constant threat of germs and the potential for her getting sick. We had tried many thermometers before hearing about the Kinsa Digital Smart Ear Thermometer, which is accurate, noninvasive and reads within seconds of touching the baby's ear. This thermometer has given us peace of mind and has allowed us to monitor our daughter without the added stress of making her uncomfortable. We are incredibly pleased with our purchase and highly recommend this product to all parents!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Symptom management simplified!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer synched easily to my iPhone via bluetooth right out of the box! I immediately started taking the temperature of everyone in my family and I was able to assign the temperatures to profiles I set up in the Kinsa app to keep track of all of our health information. It will be so handy the next time I'm at the pediatrician not to have to rely on my sleep deprived mommy brain for when symptoms started or for how many days one of my kiddos has been running a fever. I definitely expect this to make life a bit easier the next time a nasty virus hits us.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for family health
customer_reviews.text: I love these thermometers. I had a regular one but when Iphone 7 came out, could not use as there is no audio plug in. Bought this one because it is bluetooth and does not have to be plugged into phone.
customer_reviews.author: QTPie

customer_reviews.title: Great for moms with kids!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved all my kinsa smart thermometers, however this is the best i have owned yet! It takes temperatures so quick. I love how it syncs to my phone and I can log each individual childs temp and symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hart

customer_reviews.title: not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this because of blue-tooth capability and because I have a fever constantly. I was sick of recording my temps on paper and carrying them to doctors. I checked it against 3 other thermometers ( 1 of them being my physicians) and it was wildly inaccurate every time.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn d

customer_reviews.title: Bought again
customer_reviews.text: I love my old one soo much that I had to buy another one while my first one is in storage while I’m house hunting. Plus, super easy to have a visual track record for my doctor to visually see even if I’m not currently running a temperature while in her office.
customer_reviews.author: Holly L Payne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It is one second temperature read and it automatically sent to your phone if you have it set up. It makes it super easy to keep track of temperatures if you have to take your little ones to the doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lowe

customer_reviews.title: It does everything I forget to do!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer! For some reason I can never remember to track temperatures, symptoms, and when I gave medications. (Probably because the need usually arises in the dead of the night.) I can also set it up to give me much needed reminders about when to administer the next doses of medicine. This will does everything that I am really bad at doing. I'm thrilled! The app is easy to set up and easy to use, plus the ear temperature is easier to catch than swiping the forehead.
customer_reviews.author: Kim G.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I liked the simplicity of this product - it has only one button and the measurement is immediate. The smartphone sync was OK; the accompanying app works well but the bluetooth connection can be a bit spotty. I'd consider the syncing as more of a gimmick compared to the primary function of this device. One bonus point for the friendly industrial design and simple display, particularly compared to a lot of "grey thermometers" with ambitious buttons in the market.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Wildy Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I must be someone who has a "small, curved ear canal" because I can get 100 different readings on myself 100 different times. Works for my husband and son, but beware if you have issues like swimmers ear or curved ear canals, this will not work for you. Googling this product and how to troubleshoot it turns up with "just factory reset the device". There is one 45 second instructional video.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Chenelle

customer_reviews.title: Junk-don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is not accurate at all. I can use it 10 times in a row and get 10 different readings. I am a nurse and know how to accurately take a temperature. I’ve had it for several months and just hate it. It’s going right in the garbage and I’m getting something different. Don’t waste your time or money. It’s junk!
customer_reviews.author: Alz

customer_reviews.title: Incosistent readings
customer_reviews.text: The readings vary a lot depending on how you place it in the ear. It's hard to determine what is the accurate temperature because it depends on how you measure. The instructions don't tell you exactly how to position the thermometer inside the ear to get an accurate reading.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana K

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great price, quality, and accuracy! I love all the features it has to offer! Battery is great on it too! I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: I can't even explain how much I love this thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I can't even explain how much I love this thermometer. Every time my child gets sick the advice nurse always ask me about my child's temperature. It is great to be able to just look at the app to see the log. This thermometer has also made it so much easier to take her temperature since she likes to wiggle when I try to take it. Using a forehead thermometer was a pain because she would not sit still long enough to get an accurate reading. This thermometer is quick and accurate! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Orr

customer_reviews.title: Terrible and inaccurate! Save your $
customer_reviews.text: Unless my family and I are all Aliens or Vampires...this thermometer tells us our temps are between 94-96 degrees. It never reads accurately and yes I’ve tried changing the batteries. It’s completely useless!
customer_reviews.author: Wildberry

customer_reviews.title: Best Smart Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer!! I was able to quickly and easily download the app and set it up for each member of our family. The thermometer works quickly and is easy to read. The app stores all of your temperature readings and you can separate the readings by family member. This makes it easy when talking to the kids pediatrician! Gone are the days of keeping track of temps on a big white board and maybe forgetting to write something down. You can also keep track of medication dosing!! Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and read. Super quick but it doesn't give accurate readings at all. I feel like ive wasted my money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A

customer_reviews.title: Overall works well
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this product. Every now and then it takes a little longer to turn on. Requires picking the button a few times. Not sure why. Overall works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jdrumm03

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Received my Kinsa the other day. Pairing the thermometer to the app was easy and I love how you can create a profile for everyone in your family. Now I can track their temperatures without having to write anything down! I compared it to my old forehead/ear thermometer and the readings are comparable +/- 0.2 degrees. Comfortable enough for my two year old who thought it was a toy! Now I have multiple readings all taken my him!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Truong

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermometer for Small Ears!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer. My son has an extra fold in his ear and super small ear canals so I have a hard time finding a thermometer that works. If I pull his ear back just a bit it works perfectly and super fast! Love that it connects to to my phone and I can even have the app remind me to take medicines!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Myers

customer_reviews.title: Like for the most part
customer_reviews.text: A little irritating that the thermometer can ONLY be used with the app on your phone. You can’t just take a quick temp unless you have your phone and open the app first.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: We've been using a Braun for the past twelve years and needed to replace it recently. The Amazon reviews rated this product highly but it has never worked properly. The thermometer reads in extremes, from 96 to 104 in the same ear within seconds of taking the prior temperature. When your child is ill, it is important to trust your thermometer. This is not one that can be counted on when needed.
customer_reviews.author: angielin

customer_reviews.title: No hassles, no doubts!
customer_reviews.text: I've had loads of digital thermometers and have hated a lot of them. This one is simple, straightforward with no hassle and no confusion!
customer_reviews.author: Karma Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for us. We stopped trying to use it.
customer_reviews.text: We can't use it, it's not accurate, too hard to get a reading and the app is glitchy.
customer_reviews.author: TheTotalConcept

customer_reviews.title: I take my temp every day as part of an ...
customer_reviews.text: I take my temp every day as part of an overall health plan. This syncs with Apple Health and takes less than 30 seconds to pull a temp.
customer_reviews.author: 401st ASG

customer_reviews.title: Easy but not accurate 100 percent.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like not 100 percent accurate. But really easy to read. So I usually measure several times just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Hyun

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with app
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it can connect to your phone. I set it up with the app and it won’t record anything in the app. So now it’s just an overpriced thermometer
customer_reviews.author: Kevinre12

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT UNTIL...
customer_reviews.text: It became unreliable and cannot find a way to reset and see if it will get back on track. Good for keeping track of temps in order to report to physician. However recently my son’s temp was higher than the thermometer reported. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate and unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, unfortunately, it's totally inaccurate. I get vastly different readings every use even if they are taken in the same ear seconds apart. This has included normal temps up to fevers in the 100s. It's all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Love the companion app
customer_reviews.text: I love how once you take a temp it records instantly onto the app. I found removing the cap extremely difficult but other than that it’s easy to use. Daunting to use on a baby but doable.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Shields

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Inacurate
customer_reviews.text: Pros: very easy read, and easy to use. Cons: started to read completely unreasonable temperatures after about two months of use. I know my body temperature is higher than 82F, so it's a bit frustrating that I spent as much money on it as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate readings
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this and were excited about the Bluetooth technology to track our children’s fevers. However, from day one this thermometer has not been accurate. You will get a reading of 103.5 then 97.2 right after. Following up with a simple thermometer after the temperature was actually 101. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Coffin

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thermometer! I love that there's an app and can keep track of previous readings. Every time my kiddos get sick, I have post-it notes of times and temperatures and medicines taken. Now I don't need to do that! The app does it all for you! I really like that it literally takes a second to take the temperature. It has been fast and accurate! There's also a screen that lights up for those middle-of-the-night check ups.
customer_reviews.author: karen

product_meta.title: Kinsa [Old Model] Smart Ear Thermometer for Fever - Accurate, Fast, FDA Cleared Thermometer - Best Digital Medical Children, Kid, Adult and Baby Termometro
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueFeel better with Kinsa.

Kinsa turned the first device you grab when sickness strikes - the thermometer - into a support system to help keep your family healthy.

Kinsa's newest Ear thermometer supports you from the first sign of illness through recovery and beyond by focusing on what's most important - what to do next.

The Kinsa Smart Ear Thermometer takes an accurate read in one second, at the push of a button. It connects to your phone via bluetooth to so you always have access to your family's illness details (for you or the pediatrician) and offers real-time, personalized guidance on how & when to soothe symptoms, take meds and call the doctor. It is gentle enough to use on a sleeping or squirmy baby.

With a 2 year/1000 readings battery life, you won't be fumbling around in the dark looking for batteries with this baby thermometer when you need that nighttime reading.

Cleaning is easy. Use a soft cloth or cotton swab with up to 75% alcohol. Water resistant, not waterproof - so don't drop it in the tub!

The Kinsa Digital In Ear Thermometer is BPA and Latex Free.

Kinsa is compatible with most iOS and Android devices.
feature_bullets: Kinsa Smart Ear thermometer takes accurate and reliable 1 second digital temperature readings
Pediatrician-recommended and FDA-cleared for babies, toddlers, children and adults
Kinsa smartphone app uses your age, fever and symptoms to help you understand how to feel better faster, when to take meds and whether to call the doctor
Keep track of your family’s health, get medicine dosage and reminders, connect to telemedicine, keep fidgety kids still during readings with Bubble game & Sesame Street mode

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars798 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
